text: (ai rasool) unake raaz kee baaton mein aksar mein bhalaee (ka to naam tak) nahin magar (ho) jo shakhs kisee ko sadaqa dene ya achchhe kaam kare ya logon ke daramiyaan mel milaap karaane ka hukm de (to alabatta ek baat hai) aur jo shakhs (mahaz) khuda kee khushanoodee kee khvaahish mein aise kaam karega to ham anaqareeb hee use bada achchha badala ata pharamaenge
